name: Amethyst Crown
title: A Pact Deeply Felt: Amethyst Crown
desc: "In honor of the eternal oasis and the flourishing Padisarahs, the Lord of Flowers wore an amethyst crown."
in_play_description:
After an opponent takes DMG: If this DMG is Dendro DMG or triggers Dendro-Related Reactions, Gain 1 Crowning Crystal. (Max 2 stacks.)
When the Action Phase begins: If your Crowning Crystal count is 2, the next Elemental Reaction you trigger deals +2 DMG during this Round.
